text: {"tiddlers":{"$:/pluginlibrary/ajh/released":{"text":"The plugin library for the latest and greatest plugins from [ext[t5a|https://github.com/t5a/t5a.github.io.git]]; most recent released versions of plugins by [ext[Andrew|http://t5a.github.io/#Andrew%20Harrison]].","url":"https://t5a.github.io/plugins","title":"$:/pluginlibrary/ajh/released","tags":"$:/tags/PluginLibrary","caption":"Tiddlywiki Library for Plugins by Andrew Harrison"},"$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlyviewer/icon":{"text":"","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlyviewer/icon","tags":"$:/tags/Image"},"$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlyviewer/image":{"text":"","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlyviewer/image","tags":"$:/tags/Image"},"$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlyviewer/license":{"text":"Tiddly Viewer Copyright (c) 2019-<> Andrew Harrison [[BSD 3-Clause License|https://raw.githubusercontent.com/t5a/t5a.github.io/master/LICENSE]]","url":"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/t5a/t5a.github.io/master/LICENSE","type":"","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlyviewer/license","tags":"$:/tags/License","license-type":"BSD 3-Clause License"},"$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlyviewer/readme":{"text":"This plugin displays external pages fully formatted instead of as just plain text. By adding a ''tiddly'' field and path to an external page, it recognizes to display the page in an object frame. @@color:red; ''WARNING'' @@: Use of Tiddly Viewer to display untrusted web sites could be a security risk. Simply drag $:/plugins/ajh/tiddlyviewer to the top of your tiddlywiki display, save and reload. This plugin comprises: * Template * Stylesheet","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlyviewer/readme"},"$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlyviewer/stylesheet":{"text":".tc-tiddly-viewer {width:{{!!width}};height:{{!!height}};}.tc-badge-tiddlyviewer {fill:#ff0;stroke:#30f;stroke-width:2;}.tc-icon-tiddlyviewer {fill:#30f;height:24pt;width:24pt;}","width":"100%","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlyviewer/stylesheet","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","height":"85vh","caption":"Tiddly Viewer"},"$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlyviewer/template":{"text":"<$reveal type='nomatch' state=<> text='hide' retain='yes' animate='yes'> <$list filter='[all[current]has[tiddly]]'> ","title":"$:/plugins/ajh/tiddlyviewer/template","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate","list-after":"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/tags"}}}
title: $:/plugins/ajh/tiddlyviewer
